response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This unique item is not just an object; it's a testament to innovation and quality that can significantly enhance your lifestyle or business operations. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $12,000 to the right person. Considering your potential needs and the benefits this product could bring to you, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire it for $15,000. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the added value and exclusivity it offers. I look forward to discussing how this product can be a valuable addition to your endeavors.", "product_price": 15000}
